name: Artificial Unintelligence
description:
Use arrow keys to move

Use C to order the robot to go to start moving in the 

Press X to tell them to stop moving

direction your mouse is they will NOT Move pass walls to help you(sorry:\)

he may randomly move a bit from time to time so make sure the robot is in a safe place

Press r to restart a level

Hard mode is more buggy and VERY DIFFICULT

Hold Space to run

Press P to open The options menu

This was made for the WOWIE Game jam

this game may have a few bugs with the robot moving on its own but i wanted to keep that idea

This game was made IN 1 DAY! so it only has 20 levels and few ideas

Hard mode is for Professionals its that hard i cant even do it

With 10 levels and fun(possibly) Gameplay 

This game might be updated in the future but for now its done
